name: Comming Up Snake Eyes
description:
Move with Arrow Keys and WASD, Aim and Shoot with the mouse, Roll with Space Bar

The idea was something similar to Enter The Gungeon, but when you rolled it would give you some kind of buff or negative effect depending on what you rolled. This is my first game I'm publishing and definitely struggled with the time limit. I'll keep building on it and see where it goes. 

Thank you for playing!
